records.QueryText: Farmer wants to know information about collection of soil sample for soil testing?
records.KccAns: Recommended  for  Aside from DIB hole clean from top to bottom 2 cm Thick clay clean bucket or tray and put in the bottom to take out. collected the soil by hand, mix thoroughly and put on clean clothes pile , make a goal . Different finger to remove dirt from the pile of four equal parts . Now the remaining two parts of the soil again to mix well and set goals . This process is then repeated until almost half forts Top soil remains . The representative samples.
This week weather is Partly cloudy and  Possibility of Rainfall.

records.QueryText: farmer want to know information about making of organic pesticide?
records.KccAns: Nim ki 10-12 kilo pattiyo, 200 li?ar Pani Men 4 din tak bhigonye. Pani hara pila hone par ise chankar, ek eka? ki phasal par chi?akav karane se illi ki rokatham hoti hai. Is au?adhi ki tivrata ko ba?hane hetu besram, dhatura, tambaku aadi ke patton ko milakar ka?a banane se au?adhi ki tivrata ba?h jati hai aur yah dava kai prakar ke ki?on ko na?? karane me yah dava upayogi sidh hai.
